name: Mercy Emerald Hotel
address: 180 Nguyá»…n VÄƒn Thoáº¡i, ÄÃ  Náºµng, ViÃªÌ£t Nam
description:
Located in Da Nang, 300 metres from My Khe Beach, Mercy Emerald Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is fitted with a safety deposit box and some rooms will provide you with city views. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

The hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Mercy Emerald Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna.

Bac My An Beach is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Love Lock Bridge Da Nang is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 6 km from Mercy Emerald Hotel.
